Syntax.Name: EHF CV Request 1.0 RC1
Syntax.Document:
cv-req:CVRequest CV Request document
cv-req:CustomizationID Document Identifier Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction. ...
cv-req:ProfileID Process Identifier Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. ...
cv-req:ID CV request identifier Document identifier for referencing the document instance. 1
cv-req:IssueDate Issue Date The date on which the transaction instance was issued, format YYYY-MM-DD. 2020-02-02
cv-req:IssueTime Issue Time The time on which the transaction instance was issued. 08:30:00
cv-req:FolderReference Folder Reference
cv-req:ID Doffin Reference The Doffin Reference number.
scheme Doffin scheme identifier DOFFIN

cv-req:Education Education requirement
cv-req:ID Education identifier Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents. 1
cv-req:Requirement Education requirement Requirement related to the specific education
cv-req:EducationDegree Education degree A specific requirement of education degree. Use codelist eduDegree.
cv-req:SubjectArea Educational Subject Area A specific requirement of educational subject area. Use codelist subArea.
cv-req:RegistrationType Registration type A specific requirement of registration type, e.g. HPR-number. HPR
cv-req:RelevantExperience Relavant experience If formel education is not necessary and accept relevant experiences.
cv-req:Type Type Experience A specific requirement about a type of experience. Expressed by using classification of occupations code.
cv-req:MinYear Minimum year A specific requirement about minimum year of experience. 2
cv-req:AlternativeEducation Alternative education requirement If alternative education requirement is accepted.
cv-req:ID Alternative education identifier Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents. 1
cv-req:Requirement Education requirement Requirement related to the specific education
cv-req:EducationGrade Education grade A specific requirement of education grade. Use codelist eduGrade.
cv-req:SubjectArea Educational Subject Area A specific requirement of educational subject area. Use codelist subArea.
cv-req:RegistrationType Registration type A specific requirement of registration type, e.g. HPR-number. HMS
cv-req:RelevantExperience Relavant experience If formel education is not necessary and accept relevant experiences.
cv-req:Type Experience Type A specific requirement about a type of experience. Expressed by using classification of occupations code.
cv-req:MinYear Minimum year A requirement about minimum year of experience. 5
cv-req:Course Course requirements Course related requirements.
cv-req:ID Course identifier Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents. 1
- cv-req:Requirement Course requirement Requirement related to the specific course.
cv-req:Title Course title The specific name of the course. HMS
cv-req:Type Course type The specific name of the course expressed as code.
cv-req:Version Course version The version of the course. 1.0
cv-req:Period Period The period the course has been completed.
cv-req:StartDate Start date Course start date. 2020-01-10
cv-req:EndDate End date Course end date. This may be a date in future. 2020-05-05
cv-req:AlternativeCourse Alternative course requirements If alternative course requirement is accepted.
cv-req:ID Alternative course identifier Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents. 1
- cv-req:Requirement Course requirement Requirement related to the specific course.
cv-req:Title Course title The specific name of the course. HMS
cv-req:Type Course type The specific name of the course expressed as code.
cv-req:Version Course version The version of the course. 1.0
cv-req:Period Period The period the course has been completed.
cv-req:StartDate Period start date Course start date. 2020-01-10
cv-req:EndDate Period end date Course end date. This may be a date in future. 2020-05-05

cv-req:ID Language Identifier Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents. 1
cv-req:Requirement Language Requirement Requirement related to the specific course.
cv-req:Language Language The specific language. Use code list ISO639.
cv-req:OralSkill Language Minimum requirement about the oral skill related to the specific language. Use EU Global Scale code list.
cv-req:WrittenSkill Language Minimum requirement about the written skill related to the specific language. Use EU Global Scale code list.

cv-req:ProjectExperience Project experience requirements Project experience related requirements.
cv-req:ID Project experience Identifier Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents. 1
- cv-req:Requirement Project experience Requirement Requirement related to the specific project experience.
cv-req:ExperienceType Experience type A specific requirement about a type of experience. Expressed by using classification of occupations code.
cv-req:IndustryType Industry type A requirement about a industry related to project experience. Use code list NACE.
cv-req:WorkPlace Work place A project experience related to a work place, country. Use code list ISO3166.
cv-req:JobSector Job sector A project experience related to a job sector. Use code list sector.
cv-req:RequiredTotalExperience Required total experience A requirement about total exeperience. Need to provide a amount of either minimum or maximum experience.
cv-req:MinimumExperience Minimum experience A specific requirement about minimum year of experience. 2
cv-req:Maximum Maximum experience A specific requirement about maximum year of experience. 2
cv-req:ExperienceDescription Project experience description Detailed description about the requirement of project experion
cv-req:PositionPercent Position percent A specific requirement about the percent of the project exeperience position. 100
cv-req:Role Role A specific requirement about the role of the project experience.
cv-req:Activities Activities Detailed description about what the cancdidate need to have done in the specific project experience. E.g. Finance analysis Must have done financial analysis by using R.
cv-req:ExperienceValue Experience value Detailed description about the project value
cv-req:ProjectParticipation Project participation A specific requirement about candidate's project participation, stated as months. 5
cv-req:ProjectSize Project size A specific requirement about the total size of the project, stated as months. 5
cv-req:ProjectValue Project Value Total value of the project.
currencyID Currencyidentifier

cv-req:Skills Skills requirements Skills related requirements.
cv-req:ID Skills identifier Each line must have an identifier that is unique within the document to make it possible to positively reference the line. For example, from other documents. 1
- cv-req:Requirement Skills requirement Requirement related to the specific skill.
cv-req:Title Skill title The specific name of the skill. HMS
cv-req:Type Skill type The specific name of the skill expressed as code.
cv-req:Version Skill version The version of the skill. 11
cv-req:SkillPractice Skill practice Detailed descrption about the skill practices
cv-req:LastPractice Skill last practice Last time the skill need to be practice. 2020-03-03
cv-req:MinimumLengthPractice Skill minimum length practice How long the skill need to be practiced continously, state the minimum length as months. 5
cv-req:SkillsReference Skill reference If the skill need a reference or not. State true or false.
True
